CDISC Notes:
ETCD (the companion to ELEMENT) is limited to 8 characters and does not have special character restrictions. These values should be short for ease of use in programming, but it is not expected that ETCD will
need to serve as a variable name.

Expresses rule for ending Element. Either TEENRL or
TEDUR must be present for each Element.
Planned Duration of Element in ISO 8601 format. Used when the rule for ending the Element is applied after a fixed duration.
